sentences.en: All pollution is simply an unused resource.
sentences.cn: 所有的污染只不过是一种未被利用的资源.

sentences.en: He demanded a refund on the unused tickets.
sentences.cn: 他要求对未使用之票给予退款.

sentences.en: He was unused to alcohol and it affected him quickly.
sentences.cn: 他喝不惯烈酒,很快酒精就产生了作用.

sentences.en: I had an unused ticket for Antanarivo.
sentences.cn: 我有一张到安塔那利瓦的票,还没用过.

sentences.en: If unused, winter radishes run to seed in spring.
sentences.cn: 如果不去动的话，冬萝卜会在春天开花结籽。

sentences.en: Not evil, but goodness more often allures the feeling mind unused to reason.
sentences.cn: 往往不是恶, 而是善,迷惑那些缺少理智、多愁善感的人.

sentences.en: Put away the unused plates and cups.
She flushed the unused tablets away.
sentences.cn: 她冲走了未服用的药片.

sentences.en: Since life rarely depends on me, my great skills are subdued, unused.
sentences.cn: 由于生活很少依赖我, 我高超的技术被压抑, 无用武之地.

sentences.en: The books looked faded, dusty and unused.
sentences.cn: 那些书看上去褪了色，尘封已久。

sentences.en: The insurance on his BMW has run out, and the car stands unused.
sentences.cn: 他那部宝马车的保险已过期，而车还没用过。

sentences.en: The unused inputs are tied to + 5 v.
sentences.cn: 把空的输入端连接到+5伏.

sentences.en: There is a collection of dust in an unused room.
sentences.cn: 空着不用的房间常常积起大量灰尘.

sentences.en: They had been hid in the unused gallery listening to their own funeral sermon!
sentences.cn: 他们刚才一直躲在那没人的长廊里,倾听着追悼他们的颂词哩!

sentences.en: This is an easy routine, designed for anyone who is unused to exercise.
sentences.cn: 这是一套简单的固定动作，是为不常锻炼的人设计的。

trans.tran_cn: 未用过的，不用的，空着的，不习惯的，无经验的
trans.tran_en: not being used, or never used
